name: electrify
effect: Changes the target’s move’s type to electric if it hasn’t moved yet this turn.
short_effect: Changes the target’s move’s type to electric if it hasn’t moved yet this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.
